title: Mobile-Based Mathematics Learning Experience Design for 40s Working Adults

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Accessing math concepts applicable to daily workplace tasks via mobile devices, with personalized feedback through learning data analysis

learning_goals: Learners can apply linear equations and statistical concepts to solve real-life problems encountered in work environments
Learners maintain a self-directed learning pattern via a mobile app for at least three sessions per week and achieve an 80%+ completion rate
Learners provide feedback on peers' problem-solving strategies at least three times through a peer assessment system

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
